content:
I think it's the combination of exploring new worlds, advanced technology, and the "what if" scenarios that really draw me in. I love how sci-fi and fantasy can take current societal issues and extrapolate them into the future or an alternate reality, making you think about the implications and consequences. It's like a thought experiment come to life!

By the way, I've been thinking about my morning routine and trying to optimize it. I've started making my lunch the night before, which has saved me about 30 minutes in the morning. I've also been preparing my outfit the night before, which has saved me another 15 minutes. I'm hoping to leave the house by 6:45 am instead of 7:00 am, which will give me some extra time to grab a coffee or do some stretching exercises before I catch the bus.
